title: GG riot, no button to reconnect to chat, in ranked FAIL RIOT!
body:
Lose connection to chat, no button to reconnect LOL!

In ranked que, no one knows where am going

lose game 

GG riot useless POS!

replies.body:
That could stem from an incompatibility in your connection. Though it might just be Rito's end.

What to test out your connection?
